ai-tha-ap231:1.1_0: “Nothing by name is the name of the Suppiya,
ai-tha-ap231:1.2_0: I’m not very arrival at them.
ai-tha-ap231:1.4_0: as I was the King’s nephew.
ai-tha-ap231:2.1_0: I have attained the King of Kosala,
ai-tha-ap231:2.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap231:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap231:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap231:4.1_0: twenty eons after the left of the world.
ai-tha-ap231:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Suḷiya.
ai-tha-ap231:7.1_0: very beneficial it was well-trained, The Elder Nuns,
